title: FS, US representative discuss regional situation
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 30 (APP): United States Special Representative for Afghanistan Thomas West called on Foreign Secretary Asad M. Khan here on Monday.According to the Foreign Office, views on the regional situation were exchanged during the meeting.Asad Majeed Khan reaffirmed Pakistanâ€™s commitment to a peaceful, stable, and interconnected region.
